name: ConvNet
tagline: A GPU implementation of Convolutional Neural Nets in C++
body:
### Welcome to ConvNet.
- Supports Multi-GPU architectures
- Provides a fast CPU-only feature extractor

### Installation
[Install guide] (https://github.com/torontodeeplearning/convnet/blob/master/INSTALL)

### Examples
Examples of training and feature extraction are provided for
- Imagenet (ILSVRC 2012 dataset)
- CIFAR-10/100
- MNIST
[Examples] (https://github.com/torontodeeplearning/convnet/tree/master/examples)

### Documentation
[here](http://torontodeeplearning.github.io/convnet/docs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
